Each wild creature you control explores. [i](If you control multiple wild creatures, you choose the order in which they explore. Make sure it’s clear which creature is exploring before you reveal any cards.)[/i]
Whenever a land card is put into your hand or graveyard from your library this turn, you may reveal that card and pay {1}{BG}. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield tapped.
